name: Stellar Arena
description:
Animal style Real-Time PVP Battles!The first figurine-themed 3D game Figure Fantasy open beta starts today! Here, you'll become the figurines' master, and experience a wonderful adventure in their miniature world!
To welcome you to the world of figurines, we have prepared a series of special events for the open beta. Come and unlock the secret stories of the figurines, share all their joys and sorrows, and protect the world with them!

BECOME A MASTER OF STRATEGY AND DECK BUILDING
Choose unique Cards to your Battle Deck and head to the Arena for Battle!Place your Cards right and resist the attack of the mechanical Legion!

COLLECT AND UPGRADE 100+ CARDS
Collect and upgrade 100+ Cards featuring different kinds of animals and bio-simulation machinery you know and love and many others. Win battles and progress to new Arenas to unlock powerful new Cards toyour collection!

BATTLE YOUR WAY TO THE TOP
Battle your way to the League and Global Tournaments to match against the best players in the world.Compete for glory and rewards!

SEASONAL EVENTS
Unlock new Seasonal items like Tower Skins, Emotes and powerful Magic ltems with the Space-pass in fun Challenges that put your skills to the test!
